review: With out a doubt the most hilarious multi-player game I have played in a long time.It's fast, it's frantic, and it's fun. The game ozzes with charm. The controls are tight and responsive, which you'll need as you more often than not you'll only win by narrowly escaping death.Nothing is more enjoyable than throwing a land mine through a teleporter and killing someone on the otherside.

Everybody I have talked into getting this game hasn't regretted it.This highly polished gem of a game will have you and your mates laughing and yelling at each other as you attempt to score goals and defend.It looks good, the controls are tight,  it's easy to get into but has a bloody high skill ceiling. As you get better your goals will look more and more epic. The first time you boost way up into the air and score a goal will surely have you fist pumpming and giving yourself the congratulations you clearly deserve.The Music is also a worthy mention as sitting in the menu customizing one of the many rocket powered cars will have you amped up and ready to play.In the short time I have had this game it has been updated often with new content and has offered some cheap DLC's as well.(You can drive DeLorean!!!!)If you are even the slightest bit curious in this game I highly recommend getting it. Chances are you will love it the moment you get to the main menu.
Never have I enjoyed failing so much.

I wanted to enjoy this game, and there are some creepy/scary moments but my god the character you control is so fustratingly noisy it puts me off the game.Call me nit picky if you will but the character sounds like he must be wearing plastic bags and concrete boots with all the rustling and stomping he makes as he does a simple task such as walking. He for some reason can't just close a door either, no no he must slam that sh8t out of any door you try to close. Then there is the sounds of his breathing which I understand are meant to be him being in a state of panic but it just sounds like he is having a heart attack to me.I just can't help but think that if I was in this situation I would be trying to be as quiet as I can as I snoop around a bloody horror scene, not slamming doors!As I have already said I know this is picky but f8ck me I wish my caharacter would just try to be quiet.
